title: Hoagie’s Heroes (Encore)
description:
Melissa Cruz and Jenny Ayala are sisters, business partners, and best friends. They run a small sandwich shop together in Fairless Hills, Pennsylvania. And they’re big on taking care of the community — so when the pandemic hit, Melissa and Jenny put up a sign in their window offering the best kind of support a restaurant can give.

Follow Melissa and Jenny’s Slack’s Hoagie Shack on Facebook and online

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. 

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
